name: Clean Inc.
description:
Build your Clean Inc. corporation, which will provide a lot of different cleaning services to its customers.

This game will give you a super satisfying experience of cleaning the rugs. You have 4 different tools to clear them. Shake the dust from the rugs, soap them, then wash and dry them. The clients can order to use some of the tools or even all of them.
Every tool has intuitive one-handed control and different styles of cleaning the rugs.

Earn some money and build new rooms in your store to provide even more cleaning services. Unlock new tools and decorations for your store.

- Buy new rooms for your store
- Hire personnel to work instead of you, while you are away
- Unlock over 24 unique and funny skins for your tools
- Decorate your store with 17 items
- Complete daily tasks
- Check-in every day for new rewards

Can you manage that many orders?

*** Don’t miss the update with the new room and new mechanics for dry cleaning Coming Soon! ***
